item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，雷德斯通、埃里森向派拉蒙投资者提出让步
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，雷德斯通（Redstone）家族和 Skydance Media 首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）都做出了让步，以使派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）潜在的控制权变更对该公司的其他投资者更具吸引力。【原文：The Redstone family and Skydance Media CEO David Ellison have both made concessions to make a potential change in control at Paramount Global more appealing the company's other investors, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 市场静待美联储，美元小幅走软
item.description: 受日本假期影响，美元在周一早盘交易中略微走软，不过日元、欧元和英镑仍维持在上周五震荡时段触及的区间底部附近。【原文：The U.S. dollar was a shade softer in early deals on Monday, thinned by a holiday in Japan, though the yen, euro and sterling stayed near the bottom of the ranges hit during Friday's volatile session.】

item.title: 油价因美国通胀担忧而收窄涨幅
item.description: 周一亚市早盘，油价下跌，扭转了上周五的涨势，原因是美国通胀数据进一步暗淡了很快降息的前景，并提振了美元，损害了石油需求。【原文：Oil prices fell in early Asian trading on Monday, reversing gains from Friday as U.S. inflation data further dimmed the prospects of interest rate cuts anytime soon and boosted the dollar, which hurts oil demand.】

item.title: SK Innovation 预计第二季度炼油利润稳健，电池部门亏损扩大
item.description: 韩国最大炼油企业 SK Energy 的所有者 SK Innovation Co Ltd 周一表示，由于需求坚挺，预计第二季度炼油利润率将继续保持稳健。【原文：SK Innovation Co Ltd , owner of South Korea's top refiner SK Energy, said on Monday it expects solid refining margins to continue in the second quarter backed by firm demand.】

item.title: 星空娱乐执行主席福斯特卸任，管理层出走潮再添新丁
item.description: 星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周一表示，其执行主席大卫-福斯特（David Foster）在上任仅几周后就将离职，这使这家陷入困境的澳大利亚赌场运营商的高级管理层又出现了一次大换血。【原文：Star Entertainment said on Monday its Executive Chairman David Foster will leave step down just weeks after being appointed to the role, adding to an exodus of senior management at the beleaguered Australian casino operator.】

item.title: 独家报道中国企业 "转入地下 "支付俄罗斯款项，银行纷纷退缩
item.description: 中国南方的一家电器制造商发现很难将产品运往俄罗斯，这并不是因为这些小工具有什么问题，而是因为中国的大银行出于对美国制裁的担忧，正在限制此类交易的支付。【原文：An appliance maker in southern China is finding it hard to ship its products to Russia, not because of any problems with the gadgets but because China's big banks are throttling payments for such transactions out of concern over U.S. sanctions.】

item.title: 2024 年第一季度英国汽车保费小幅上涨
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，英国第一季度的汽车保险费用上涨了 1%，表明去年保费上涨的势头有所缓解。【原文：The cost of car insurance in the UK rose 1% in the first quarter, a survey showed on Monday, indicating an easing in the rise of premium seen last year.】

item.title: 新加坡电信（Singtel）预计 2024 年下半年将出现亏损；标志性减值 23 亿美元
item.description: 新加坡电信公司（Singapore Telecommunications）周一表示，预计 2024 财年下半年将出现净亏损，因为该公司在此期间计提了 31 亿新元（22.8 亿美元）的非现金减值准备。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications said on Monday it expects to report a net loss for second-half of fiscal year 2024, as it flagged exceptional non-cash impairment provisions of S$3.1 billion ($2.28 billion) for the period.】

item.title: 友邦保险第一季度新业务价值增长 31%，宣布回购 20 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于香港的友邦保险集团周一公布，受惠于各业务部门的强劲表现，按固定汇率计算的第一季度新业务价值（VONB）上升 31%，并宣布额外回购 20 亿美元股票。【原文：Hong Kong-based insurer AIA Group on Monday posted a 31% rise in its first-quarter value of new business (VONB) on a constant exchange currency basis helped by strong performance across segments, and announced an additional $2 billion share buyback.】

item.title: 早间竞价日元跌宕起伏，美国科技滋补品
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 尼日利亚获得马士基 6 亿美元的海港基础设施投资
item.description: 尼日利亚总统府在周日的一份声明中表示，尼日利亚获得了丹麦船运公司 A.P. Moller-Maersk 6 亿美元的海港基础设施投资。【原文：Nigeria secured a $600 million investment in seaport infrastructure from Danish shipping company A.P. Moller-Maersk , the presidency said in a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 德意志银行将评估可能的邮政银行结算方案
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周日表示，将 "仔细评估 "就其收购邮政银行的诉讼可能达成的和解方案，该诉讼要求德意志银行为高达 13 亿欧元（13.9 亿美元）的索赔拨备。【原文：Deutsche Bank said on Sunday that it would "carefully assess" options for a possible settlement in litigation over its takeover of Postbank that has required it to make provision for claims of up to 1.3 billion euros ($1.39 billion).】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，欧舒丹的亿万富翁老板接近可能提出 70 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 据彭博新闻社援引知情人士的话报道，欧舒丹国际集团（L'Occitane International SA）的董事长兼亿万富翁即将提出将这家法国护肤品公司私有化的建议，包括债务在内，这笔交易的价值约为 70 亿美元。【原文：The chairman and billionaire owner of L'Occitane International SA is close to making a proposal to take the French skin-care firm private in a deal that could value it at about $7 billion including debt, Bloomberg News reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，Blackstone 将提高对 Hipgnosis 的出价
item.description: 据天空新闻周日报道，私募股权投资巨头 Blackstone 正准备对 Hipgnosis Songs Fund 提出更高的出价，该公司拥有夏奇拉和金发女郎等艺术家的音乐版权。【原文：Private equity giant Blackstone is preparing to lodge an improved bid for Hipgnosis Songs Fund which owns the music rights of artists including Shakira and Blondie, Sky News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，中国券商中金公司将交易员基本工资削减 25
item.description: 三位消息人士称，中国国际金融有限公司（中金公司）将把在岸投资银行家的基本工资削减多达 25%，这是在市场动荡和中国政府推行紧缩政策的背景下降低成本的一项重大举措。【原文：China International Capital Corp (CICC) is cutting the base pay of onshore investment bankers by as much as 25%, three sources said, in a major effort to reduce costs amid volatile markets and Beijing's austerity drive.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，埃隆-马斯克将前往中国访问特斯拉的第二大市场
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周日搭乘航班飞往北京，在这个电动汽车制造商的第二大市场开启了一次惊喜之旅。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk was on a flight heading to Beijing on Sunday to kick off a surprise trip in the electric vehicle maker's second-biggest market, according to two people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 香港财政司司长称第一季度香港经济增长2.5%-3.5
item.description: 香港财政司司长周日表示，预计第一季度香港本地生产总值（GDP）将增长2.5%至3.5%，连续第五个季度保持温和增长。【原文：Hong Kong's gross domestic product (GDP) is expected to grow between 2.5% and 3.5% for the first quarter, maintaining moderate growth for a fifth consecutive quarter, the city's finance chief said on Sunday.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰称美国司法部已结束对柴油车排放丑闻的调查
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰公司周六表示，美国司法部已经结束了对梅赛德斯-奔驰柴油排放丑闻的调查，该汽车制造商不再面临指控。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice has closed its probe into the Mercedes-Benz diesel emissions scandal and the car manufacturer is no longer facing charges, the company said on Saturday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，出价被拒后，必和必拓考虑改进对英美资源集团的收购方案
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，必和必拓集团正在考虑对英美资源集团（Anglo American）提出一个更好的收购方案，在此之前，必和必拓集团提出的 390 亿美元的初步收购方案遭到了这家在伦敦上市的矿业公司的拒绝。【原文：BHP Group is considering making an improved proposal for Anglo American after its $39 billion initial offer was rejected by the London-listed miner, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 欧盟批评俄罗斯控制德国和意大利企业单位
item.description: 欧盟周六批评俄罗斯将一家意大利公司和一家德国公司的子公司置于俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司实体的 "临时外部管理 "之下，称此举凸显了莫斯科对国际规范的漠视。【原文：The European Union criticised Russia on Saturday for putting subsidiaries of one Italian and one German company under the "temporary external management" of a Gazprom entity, saying the move underscored Moscow's disregard for international norms.】

item.title: 中国第一季度工业利润增速放缓
item.description: 周六的官方数据显示，与前两个月相比，中国第一季度的工业利润增幅较小，这进一步证明这个世界第二大经济体的复苏并不均衡。【原文：China's industrial profits posted smaller gains for the first quarter compared to the first two months, official data showed on Saturday, adding to evidence of an uneven recovery for the world's second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 麦肯锡前合伙人起诉公司，称自己成了阿片类药物的 "替罪羊
item.description: 麦肯锡公司（McKinsey & Co）的一名前合伙人周五起诉了这家全球咨询公司，指控该公司诽谤他，让他成为 "替罪羊"，以转移人们对其为奥施康定（OxyContin）生产商普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma）和其他阿片类止痛药生产商提供咨询服务的注意力。【原文：A former McKinsey & Co partner sued the global consulting firm on Friday and accused it of defaming him and making him a "scapegoat" to distract attention from its work advising OxyContin maker Purdue Pharma and other manufacturers of opioid pain medications.】

item.title: 布林肯称美国芯片禁令无意阻碍中国经济增长
item.description: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯周五在接受美国国家公共电台采访时表示，美国对向中国出口先进计算芯片实施出口管制并不是为了阻碍中国的经济或技术发展。【原文：U.S. export controls on sending advanced computing chips to China are not meant to hold back China's economy or technological development, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said during an interview with National Public Radio on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司与 OpenAI 就 iPhone 生成式人工智能功能重启谈判
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道称，苹果公司已与 OpenAI 就使用该公司的生成式人工智能技术为今年晚些时候推出的 iPhone 提供一些新功能重新展开讨论。【原文：Apple Inc has renewed discussions with OpenAI about using the startup's generative AI technology to power some new features being introduced in the iPhone later this year, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官称供应链不断改善
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）首席执行官周五表示，影响飞机制造商的供应链问题正在得到改善，但仍存在一些挑战。【原文：The chief executive of Brazil's Embraer said on Friday that supply chain issues impacting planemakers have been improving but some challenges remain.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国监管机构将查封 Republic First Bancorp
item.description: 华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道称，美国监管机构将查封 Republic First Bancorp，并接近达成将其出售给另一家贷款机构的协议。【原文：U.S. regulators are set to seize Republic First Bancorp and are nearing a deal to sell it to another lender, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谷歌计划在印第安纳州和弗吉尼亚州投资 30 亿美元建设数据中心
item.description: Alphabet 旗下公司谷歌周五表示，将投资 30 亿美元在印第安纳州建立一个数据中心园区，并扩大在弗吉尼亚州的站点。【原文：Alphabet unit Google said on Friday it would invest $3 billion to set up a data center campus in Indiana and expand sites in Virginia.】

item.title: 美国空军将末日飞机合同授予内华达山脉公司
item.description: 美国空军周五表示，已将一份合同授予内华达山脉公司（Sierra Nevada Corp），由其开发 E-4B 的后继机型，该机型因能在核战争中生存而被称为 "末日机"。【原文：The U.S. Air Force said on Friday that it has awarded a contract to Sierra Nevada Corp to develop a successor to the E-4B, known as the Doomsday plane, due to its ability to survive a nuclear war.】

item.title: L3Harris 为节约成本裁员 5
item.description: 美国国防承包商 L3Harris 公司首席执行官克里斯-库巴西克（Chris Kubasik）在周五的财报后电话会议上表示，该公司本月初裁员 5%，以精简业务和节约成本。【原文：U.S. defense contractor L3Harris cut 5% of its workforce earlier this month in a bid to streamline its business and save costs, CEO Chris Kubasik said in a post-earnings conference call on Friday.】

item.title: 德意志银行将为邮政储蓄银行诉讼案提取准备金，这将影响第二季度利润
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）表示，法院对其收购邮政银行（Postbank）长达数年之久的诉讼做出裁决，要求其计提法律准备金，这将影响其第二季度和全年的盈利能力。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG said a court ruling in a years-long litigation over its takeover of Postbank will require it to make a legal provision that will impact its second quarter and full-year profitability.】
